verses.verse: Joshua<WH3091> rose up early<WH7925> in the morning;<WH1242> and they moved<WH5265> from Shittim,<WH7851> and came<WH935> to the Jordan,<WH3383> he and all the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478> They lodged<WH3885> there before they passed over.<WH5674>
It happened after<WH7097> three<WH7969> days,<WH3117> that the officers<WH7860> went<WH5674> through<WH7130> the midst of the camp;<WH4264>

and they commanded<WH6680> the people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559> "When you see<WH7200> the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and the priests<WH3548> the Levites<WH3881> bearing<WH5375> it,<WH5265> then you shall move from your place,<WH4725> and follow<WH1980> it.<WH310>

Yet there shall be a space<WH7350> between you and it,<WH505> about two thousand cubits<WH520> by measure.<WH4060> Don't<WH7126> come near to it,<WH3045> that you may know the way<WH1870> by which you must go;<WH3212> for you have not passed<WH5674> this way<WH1870> before.<WH8543>"
Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559> to the people,<WH5971> "Sanctify<WH6942> yourselves;<WH4279> for tomorrow Yahweh<WH3068> will do<WH6213> wonders<WH6381> among you.<WH7130>"

Joshua<WH3091> spoke<WH559> to the priests,<WH3548> saying,<WH559> "Take up<WH5375> the ark<WH727> of the covenant,<WH1285> and pass over<WH5674> before<WH6440> the people.<WH5971>" They took up<WH5375> the ark<WH727> of the covenant,<WH1285> and went<WH3212> before<WH6440> the people.<WH5971>

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Joshua,<WH3091> "Today<WH3117> I will begin<WH2490> to magnify<WH1431> you in the sight<WH5869> of all Israel,<WH3478> that they may know<WH3045> that as I was with Moses,<WH4872> so I will be with you.

You shall command<WH6680> the priests<WH3548> who bear<WH5375> the ark<WH727> of the covenant,<WH1285> saying,<WH559> <WH935> 'When you come to the brink<WH7097> of the waters<WH4325> of the Jordan,<WH3383> you shall stand still<WH5975> in the Jordan.<WH3383>'"
Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> "Come here,<WH5066> and hear<WH8085> the words<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> your God.<WH430>"

Joshua<WH3091> said,<WH559> "Hereby you shall know<WH3045> that the living<WH2416> God<WH410> is among<WH7130> you,<WH3423> and that he will without fail drive the Canaanite,<WH3669> and the Hittite,<WH2850> and the Hivite,<WH2340> and the Perizzite,<WH6522> and the Girgashite,<WH1622> and the Amorite,<WH567> and the Jebusite<WH2983> out<WH3423> from before you.<WH6440>
Behold,<WH727> the ark of the covenant<WH1285> of the Lord<WH113> of all the earth<WH776> passes over<WH5674> before<WH6440> you into the Jordan.<WH3383>
Now therefore take<WH3947> twelve<WH8147> men<WH376> out of the tribes<WH7626> of Israel,<WH3478> for every<WH259> tribe<WH7626> a man.<WH376>

It shall come to pass,<WH3709> when the soles of the feet<WH7272> of the priests<WH3548> who bear<WH5375> the ark<WH727> of Yahweh,<WH3068> the Lord<WH3068> of all the earth,<WH776> rest<WH5117> in the waters<WH4325> of the Jordan,<WH3383> that the waters<WH4325> of the Jordan<WH3383> will be cut off,<WH3772> even the waters<WH4325> that come down<WH3381> from above;<WH4605> and they shall stand<WH5975> in one<WH259> heap.<WH5067>"

It happened,<WH5971> when the people moved<WH5265> from their tents<WH168> to pass over<WH5674> the Jordan,<WH3383> the priests<WH3548> who bore<WH5375> the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> being before<WH6440> the people,<WH5971>

and when those who bore<WH5375> the ark<WH727> had come<WH935> to the Jordan,<WH3383> and the feet<WH7272> of the priests<WH3548> who bore<WH5375> the ark<WH727> had dipped<WH2881> in the edge<WH7097> of the water<WH4325> (for the Jordan<WH3383> overflows<WH4390> all its banks<WH1415> all the time<WH3117> of harvest<WH7105>),

that the waters<WH4325> which came down<WH3381> from above<WH4605> stood,<WH5975> and<WH259> rose up<WH6965> in one<WH259> heap,<WH5067> a great<WH3966> way off,<WH7368> at Adam,<WH121> the city<WH5892> that is beside<WH6654> Zarethan;<WH6891> and those that went down<WH3381> toward the sea<WH3220> of the Arabah,<WH6160> even the Salt<WH4417> Sea,<WH3220> were wholly cut off.<WH3772> Then the people<WH5971> passed over<WH5674> right against Jericho.<WH3405>

The priests<WH3548> who bore<WH5375> the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of Yahweh<WH3068> stood<WH5975> firm<WH3559> on dry ground<WH2724> in the middle<WH8432> of the Jordan;<WH3383> and all Israel<WH3478> passed over<WH5674> on dry ground,<WH2724> until all the nation<WH1471> had passed<WH5674> completely<WH8552> over<WH5674> the Jordan.<WH3383>
